rows.label: qst620305_msg0001
rows.name:
This place is just...
No, it's totally great!

rows.label: qst620305_msg0002
rows.name:
If a guy asks a girl to marry
him in a place like this... The
girl can't say no, right?

rows.label: qst620305_msg0003
rows.name:
Rex, help me out here. Can
you ask one of your companions
for their honest opinion?

rows.label: qst620305_msg0004
rows.name: Uhm, sure. But who do you want to ask?

rows.label: qst620305_msg0005
rows.name: Who will you ask?

rows.label: qst620305_msg0006
rows.name: Homura

rows.label: qst620305_msg0007
rows.name: Hikari

rows.label: qst620305_msg0008
rows.name: Someone else

rows.label: qst620305_msg0009
rows.name: Nia

rows.label: qst620305_msg0010
rows.name: Hana

rows.label: qst620305_msg0011
rows.name: Kagutsuchi

rows.label: qst620305_msg0012
rows.name: Saika

rows.label: qst620305_msg0013
rows.name: Meleph

rows.label: qst620305_msg0101
rows.name: Homura, what do you think?

rows.label: qst620305_msg0102
rows.name: Oh, umm...

rows.label: qst620305_msg0103
rows.name: It's certainly got a little charm!

rows.label: qst620305_msg0104
rows.name: A-a-a little?!

rows.label: qst620305_msg0105
rows.name:
Ah, no! Sorry! I meant lots!
Lots and lots of charm!

rows.label: qst620305_msg0201
rows.name: Hikari, what do you think?

rows.label: qst620305_msg0202
rows.name: It's not half bad, I suppose.

rows.label: qst620305_msg0203
rows.name:
I'm sure there are some girls in
Alst who'd be happy getting
proposed to in a place like this.

rows.label: qst620305_msg0204
rows.name:
Let's just hope Ondina
is one of them...

rows.label: qst620305_msg0301
rows.name: Nia, what do you think?

rows.label: qst620305_msg0302
rows.name: Why'd you have to go and ask me...?

rows.label: qst620305_msg0303
rows.name: But if you really want to know...

rows.label: qst620305_msg0304
rows.name: Well, it's not too bad, is it?

rows.label: qst620305_msg0305
rows.name:
If you put a real effort in to making
the moment just right, she can't
help but say "yes", I suppose!

rows.label: qst620305_msg0306
rows.name:
...Though come to think of
it, it's us who are putting
all the hard work in.

rows.label: qst620305_msg0307
rows.name:
Nia... Maybe better not to mention
that to the bride-to-be...

rows.label: qst620305_msg0401
rows.name: Hana, what do you think?

rows.label: qst620305_msg0402
rows.name: Why Rex call on Hana?

rows.label: qst620305_msg0403
rows.name:
Hana has little expertise
to contribute and may not
answer to satisfaction.

rows.label: qst620305_msg0404
rows.name:
Maybe so, but I bet at
least you'll be honest!

rows.label: qst620305_msg0405
rows.name: Then Hana will answer frankly.

rows.label: qst620305_msg0406
rows.name: Answer is: this is good place!

rows.label: qst620305_msg0407
rows.name:
Rare gemstone plus rare atmospheric
conditions equal low likelihood of
plan being considered...clich√©.

rows.label: qst620305_msg0408
rows.name:
Seem probable to Hana that person
who subject to proposal in these
circumstances accept on the spot.

rows.label: qst620305_msg0501
rows.name: Kagutsuchi, what do you think?

rows.label: qst620305_msg0502
rows.name: It seems suitable enough.

rows.label: qst620305_msg0503
rows.name:
What I can't condone, however, is
leaving one's beloved alone for so
long, and while on holiday as well.

rows.label: qst620305_msg0504
rows.name: It seems to undermine the premise, no?

rows.label: qst620305_msg0505
rows.name:
Huh?! Darn, you don't pull any
punches, do you, lady...?

rows.label: qst620305_msg0506
rows.name:
But you're right... I
gotta hurry up here!

rows.label: qst620305_msg0601
rows.name: Saika, what do you think?

rows.label: qst620305_msg0602
rows.name: I think it's great!

rows.label: qst620305_msg0603
rows.name:
Ah, I wish someone was this nice
to me, just once in my life...

rows.label: qst620305_msg0604
rows.name: Zeke's plenty nice to you, isn't he?

rows.label: qst620305_msg0605
rows.name:
Well, I'd not say he's not
nice, or anything, but
compared to this guy here...

rows.label: qst620305_msg0606
rows.name: I'm, uh, sorry to interrupt, but...

rows.label: qst620305_msg0607
rows.name: Oops, sorry, I got sidetracked.

rows.label: qst620305_msg0608
rows.name:
Where was I? Oh yeah, this
place. I think it's great!

rows.label: qst620305_msg0701
rows.name: Meleph, what do you think?

rows.label: qst620305_msg0702
rows.name:
I am hesitant to
formulate an opinion...

rows.label: qst620305_msg0703
rows.name:
Perhaps we had better extend
the question to Kagutsuchi.

rows.label: qst620305_msg0704
rows.name: Meleph-sama...

rows.label: qst620305_msg0705
rows.name:
I really think you should just
say whatever you're thinking.
Honesty is the best policy.

rows.label: qst620305_msg0706
rows.name: I see, yes... However...

rows.label: qst620305_msg0707
rows.name: Honesty and conciseness, Meleph-sama.

rows.label: qst620305_msg0708
rows.name: Ah, indeed...

rows.label: qst620305_msg0709
rows.name: In that case... Yes. I approve.

rows.label: qst620305_msg0801
rows.name: Okay! I've decided. I'll do it here!

rows.label: qst620305_msg0802
rows.name:
If I had to nitpick though, I'd have
to admit, with hesitation, that I
maybe have one teeny-tiny concern...

rows.label: qst620305_msg0803
rows.name:
Oh all right, we'll clean 'em out
for you. Can't have anything ruining
the perfect moment, right?

rows.label: qst620305_msg0804
rows.name: If you would be so, ah, kind.

rows.label: qst620305_msg0805
rows.name: Nothing to it!
